title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) etc.
OB: When accessing the Open Type dialog, the obfuscated classes (such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd', etc.) are displayed prominently.
EB: The Open Type dialog should not display the obfuscated classes prominently.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Launch the software and go to the Open Type dialog.
2. Observe the presence of obfuscated classes like 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd', etc.
